testsuite.name: dev.samic.financial.payment.orchestrator.engine.application.service.PaymentServiceTest

testcase.name: execute: rejected payment returns Rejected status
execute: approved payment saves twice (pending + approved)
execute: invalid payment method throws exception
execute: fraud alert payment returns FraudAlert status
findById: returns empty when not found
